physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Typed on back of photograph: ''The Barretts [handwritten] of Philadelphia, Four in one Family., Mother Tuberculous., 1931.'' Handwritten on back of photograph:''#388, Rear Row: Children's surname was Enbner - They were half-brothers of the Barretts, L-R Nathan Enbner, Celia Enbner, Front Row, L-R Fannie Barrett, Joe Barrett.''

mods.abstract: Four siblings pose together. Back left to right Nathan Enbner and Celia Enbner and front left to right Fannie Barrett and Joe Barrett.

name.namePart: National Home for Jewish Children in Denver

mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
